title: ApplicationStatus contains status information for the application

conditions.title: Conditions is a list of currently observed application conditions

controllerNamespace.title: ControllerNamespace indicates the namespace in which the application controller is located

history.title: History contains information about the application's sync history

resourceHealthSource.title: ResourceHealthSource indicates where the resource health status is stored: inline if not set or appTree

resources.title: Resources is a list of Kubernetes resources managed by this application

sourceType.title: SourceType specifies the type of this application

sourceTypes.title: SourceTypes specifies the type of the sources included in the application
